About

Me, stoking a fire in the wilderness of Romania.

Stijn is a designer studying Industrial Product Design at the HAN University of Applied Sciences. He likes to practice his design approach in many different fields. The main focus lies on the process and a way of thinking. Everything can be designed.

Currently enrolled in Co-Design Studio, a full-time minor in human centered design, working for real clients with coaching by experienced design professionals.
